function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in the built environment due to inadequate building hygiene and wellbeing.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and compromised public health.","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection, improved ventilation, and promotion of hygienic practices among occupants.","Technologies":"Smart ventilation systems, touchless fixtures, antimicrobial materials.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and surrounding communities.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and public health authorities."},{"Description":"Inadequate indoor environment leading to poor air quality and health issues.","Impact":"Increased respiratory problems and reduced well-being of occupants.","Mitigation":"Implementation of air quality monitoring, use of air purifiers, and adoption of green building design principles.","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, HEPA filters, natural ventilation systems.","People":"Building occupants, especially those with respiratory conditions.","Owner":"Architects, designers, and building developers."},{"Description":"Human behavior and lifestyle affecting the spread of contagious diseases within the built environment.","Impact":"Unhealthy habits and interactions contributing to disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Promotion of health-conscious behavior, public education on disease prevention, and implementation of social distancing measures.","Technologies":"Smart monitoring devices, contactless technologies, and digital health platforms.","People":"Building occupants, communities, and public health agencies.","Owner":"Educational institutions, employers, and community leaders."}]}
